com.sap.spe.pricing.transactiondata

Interface IPricingConditionCommon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICondition
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IGroupConditionUserExit, IHeaderCondition, IPricingCondition, IPricingConditionSAPExit, IPricingConditionUserExit

    public interface IPricingConditionCommon
extends ICondition
    A pricing condition contains information copied from the pricing knowledge base (from the customizing of the condition type and the pricing procedure), from the condition record, and from the result of the calculation. This interface contains all methods which are accessable in SPE-userexits and in the IPricingCondition-interface.

        Returns:
        true if the change of the conversion factors between the unit of measure of the condition record and the base unit of measure is allowed. (R/3-field: KONVD-KAEND_UFK). Is always false because the functionality is not implemented yet.

      • getConditionCategory

        char getConditionCategory()
        Grouping of conditions/conditiontypes: variants, cost, freight.... (R/3-field KONV-KNTYP) In R/3 for special logic is used for conditions with a special condition category.
        Returns:
        the condition category.

      • getConditionClass

        char getConditionClass()
        Grouping of conditions/conditiontypes: price, discount, tax, rebate. (R/3-field KONV-KOAID)
        Returns:
        the condition class (a flag if a pricing condition is a price, a discount or a tax).

      • getConditionControl

        char getConditionControl()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies eg. if a condition has been changed manually or if the condition value is fixed. (R/3-field: KONV-KSTEU)

      • getConditionRate

        ICurrencyValue getConditionRate()
        The conditionrate contains the rate (a currency value or a percentage) which is copied from the condition record. (R/3-fields: KONV-KBETR and -WAERS)
        Returns:
        the condition rate.

      • getConditionScaleDimension

        int getConditionScaleDimension()
        Returns:
        the scale dimension.

      • getConditionScale

        IDimensionalValue getConditionScale()
        Returns:
        the scalebase value of the condition. The scalebase contains a currency, a physical or a quantity value in dependence of the scalebaseindicator. (R/3-fields: KONV-KSTBS, -KONMS and -KONWS)

      • isCurrencyConversion

        boolean isCurrencyConversion()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies if the currency conversion is performed before the condition rate is multipied with the condition base or afterwards. (R/3-field: KONVD-GANZZ)

        char getManualEntryFlag()

      • getFraction

        Fraction getFraction()
        Returns:
        the conversion factor for the conversion from the condition quantity to the base unit of measure of the material (for quantity dependent pricing conditions) or the conversion factor from condition volume to the base SI unit of measure of volumes (for volume dependent pricing conditions)... (R/3-fields: KONV-KUMNE and -KUMZA)

      • getOrigin

        char getOrigin()
        Returns:
        the origin of the condition (eg. automatically determined or manually entered) (R/3-field: KONV-KHERK)

      • getPlusMinus

        char getPlusMinus()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies if the rate of the condition should be positive or negative. (' ': positive and negative rates allowed; 'A': only positive rates allowed; 'X': only negative rates allowed) (R/3-field: KONVD-KNEGA)

        Returns:
        the pricingunit.
